document_data.name: the Kashik
document_data.mainbody: The '''Kashik''' were an elite organization from the [[Hordelands]] during the 14th century [[DR]].
document_data.Organization: 10,000 men comprised the Kashik. They were formed from the most elite members of the army.
document_data.Description: Only members of the Kashik were allowed to wear special black [[kalat]]s, easily making them stand out from the common soldiers.
document_data.Activities: The Kashik served as the personal bodyguard of the [[Yamun Khahan|Great Khan]]. Day and night shifts helped prevent any assassination attempts on their lord.
